Package nl.han.ica.oopg.alarm

Class Alarm

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.alarm.Alarm
public class Alarm
extends java.lang.Object
The alarm object is used to alert objects that listen to the alarm. Implement the IAlarmListener interface on objects you would like to alert and add them to the alarm object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Alarm​(java.lang.String name, double seconds)
    Create a new alarm object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addTarget​(IAlarmListener alarm)
    Add a new object that implements the IAlarmListener interface to listen to the alarm.
    double getSeconds()
    Get the seconds of the timer which is set to the alarm.
    java.util.List<IAlarmListener> getTargets()
    Get all the targets which are added to the alarm.
    void removeTarget​(IAlarmListener alarm)
    Remove a object that implements the IAlarmListener interface from the alarm to stop listening.
    void setSeconds​(double seconds)
    Get the seconds of the timer of the alarm.
    void start()
    Start the timer of the alarm.
    void stop()
    Stop the timer of the alarm.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Alarm

      public Alarm​(java.lang.String name, double seconds)
      Create a new alarm object.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the Alarm
      seconds - After how many seconds you want the alarm to alert.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Start the timer of the alarm.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stop the timer of the alarm.

    • addTarget

      public void addTarget​(IAlarmListener alarm)
      Add a new object that implements the IAlarmListener interface to listen to the alarm.
      Parameters:
      alarm - The IAlarmListener that should be added

    • removeTarget

      public void removeTarget​(IAlarmListener alarm)
      Remove a object that implements the IAlarmListener interface from the alarm to stop listening.
      Parameters:
      alarm - The IAlarmListener that should be removed

    • getTargets

      public java.util.List<IAlarmListener> getTargets()
      Get all the targets which are added to the alarm.
      Returns:
      The list of IAlarmListener that should be notified

    • getSeconds

      public double getSeconds()
      Get the seconds of the timer which is set to the alarm.
      Returns:
      The number of seconds

    • setSeconds

      public void setSeconds​(double seconds)
      Get the seconds of the timer of the alarm.
      Parameters:
      seconds - The number of seconds
